title: Trade Deadline Preview, All-Star Reserves
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Marc J. Spears and Kevin Pelton to talk All-Star reserves, If we will see Ben Simmons or James Harden get traded before the deadline and the significance of the Caris LeVert trade for the Cavs.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
